thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 2 of 110
thread.title: Gary Seagraves
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Gary Seagraves

author: Gary Seagraves
title: Gary Seagraves
text: After a slow beginning the purchase was finally done. Sales person was supposed to call me when the item came in. He never called. I called and finished my purchase. I think the company is going in the correct direction, but there is no excuse for neglecting to return my original call.
